entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 28. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Blowing snow at times overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. Blowing snow at times in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
